description: Creates a user and associates them with an existing file transfer protocol-enabled server.
mitreAttackTechniques: T1537 - Transfer Data to Cloud Account

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Creating a user in the Transfer Family service results in valid credentials that could be exploited for unauthorized access.
The CreateUser API call involves the creation of a new account, which can be used by attackers to establish persistence in the environment.
The creation of a new user account allows for the potential manipulation of user roles or permissions, enabling privilege escalation.

incidents.description: Muddled Libra’s Evolution to the Cloud

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateUser to use the Transfer Family service.
